title: TERRAE NOIRE — From Forest Floor to the Finest Table
description: A luxury truffle maison landing page for the fictional brand TERRAE NOIRE. Deep forest-green palette with harvest-gold accents, Cormorant Garamond + Jost typography, Hero Type D split-grid with stat counters and 2×2 chef/dish portraits, species carousel with Swiper 11, provenance split-screen, Michelin chef partnership cards, GSAP ScrollTrigger animations throughout including word-by-word codex reveal and animated stat counters.
